summary: New Dress for UNP,CBBE,Vanilla texture users, which you can buy at Radiant Raiment. Also works as a replacer for Radiant Raiment Fine Clothes and Party Dress.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/cA7k4hg.png[/img][/center]

[center][youtube]AvNdUNaGJWs[/youtube] [youtube]uqMzUuF9-M8#t=261</div>[/youtube] [youtube]cIqEFBgVXCg[/youtube]
[center]Thanks to dptheslothking, Sidras01(watch at 4:20) and MrTarvis(starts at 1:39) for a showcase. [/center]

[center]DESCRIPTION[/center]

[center]New Dress which you can buy at Radiant Raiment in Solitude.
Also works as a replacer for Radiant Raiment Fine Clothes and Party Dress.[/center]

[center]REQUIREMENTS[/center]
[center]Mod requires new cubemap: chitin_e_ebony.dds created by Amidianborn.
You can get it by installing his Ebony Armor retexture(golden or silver):

http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37487/? [/center]

[center]COMPATIBILITY[/center]
[center]Dress is compatible with Vanilla, UNP, CBBE textures.[/center]

[center]INSTALLATION[/center]
[center]Install with NMM or place Data folder from archive to your Skyrim folder.
What you should do If you're using mods, which alters Radiant Raiment Leveled List:
Use Bashed Patch
or
Place .esp at the bottom of your load order.[/center]

[center]PROBLEMS[/center]
[center]There could be deformations or clipping with some animations, including standing idles.

P.S. if you have knowledge on how to fix such things and want to help people stop suffering from endless clipping then you're welcome to try. [/center]

[center] PERMISSION [/center]
[center]Contact me[/center]

[center]CREDITS[/center]
[center]Game of Thrones TV series - inspired by some of Cersei Lannister dresses.
Sevennity - for resolving body weight problem, feet mesh and upcomming Bombshell BBP version with weight slider.[/center][/center]
author: Nimezis

files.name: Noble Dress
files.changelogHtml: Fix: bug with boots not showing up(male version)
